programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Lesa clashes with a hot young buyer; Ricky and Bubba unearth a collection of antique gunslinger toys; Roy tries a new strategy.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The buyers look for deals in the city of Longview; Lesa and Jerry battle Jenny and Mary; Rudy seeks a strange weapon; Ricky and Bubba score more than they can handle.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Teamwork falls short when the buyers return to Fort Worth; Victor seeks an ally in his battle against Ricky and Bubba; Jenny's antique requires scientific examination; Moe and Mary stock up for a sale.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: The small town of Pantego hosts the auction; cowboy Matt Blevins goes over the top and gets under the skin of the female buyers.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Ricky and Bubba endure terrible luck in Mesquite, Texas; Jenny picks up a rare jazz album; Moe and Mary find a squatter in their locker.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Victor uncovers a box of antique periodicals in the small town of Pantego; Moe and Mary obtain a useful beauty salon item; Jenny competes against Ricky and Bubba.

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: A local auctioneer stirs up things when the buyers return to Fort Worth; Jenny and Mary disagree on the value of their purchases; Victor's protege stands to lose the most.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Midnight in the Gardena Good and Evil
programme.desc: Barry hires two psychics to "see" inside storage lockers; Jarrod and Brandi hope to save their store by taking a gamble on a unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell uncovers a macabre oddity; Dave finds an antique toy; Barry asks a member of the band Aerosmith for an appraisal.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers are in Upland, Calif.; Barry brings an advantage; Darrell gets shut out; Jarrod and Brandi fall in love with a furniture locker; Dave goes all out on a jewelry unit.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Don't Bid So Close to Me
programme.desc: The buyers battle in Rancho Cucamonga, Calif.; Dave Hester arrives in a truck large enough to fit his ego; Jarrod and Brandi obtain a vintage mask; Barry Weiss scores with a rock 'n' roll legend.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers hope for better outcomes when they return to Long Beach, Calif.; a heavy hitter brings $50,000 in locker funds; Barry acts on a tip.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Straight Into Compton: Biddaz With Attitude
programme.desc: The buyers descend on Compton, Calif.; Darrell and Brandon can't get their rappers or their lockers straight; Jarrod and Brandi find a unique suit; Dave Hester finds himself in a tight squeeze; Barry uncovers an antique GPS system.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Darrell hopes to score another major find as the bidders converge in Stanton, Calif.; Mark's custom-made man purse is filled with cash; Nabila's locker is fit for a dummy.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: Orange You Glad Dan Sold It Again?
programme.desc: In Burbank, Calif., Barry and Jarrod lose a packed locker to a bold new buyer; Herb and Mike hope to crush a contemptible competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers return to Costa Mesa, Calif.; Ivy goes all in; Darrell uncovers a major collectible; Barry bets against himself and wins.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Rene's superstitious attitude could prove to be a hindrance; Ivy trusts his gut; Jarrod and Brandi manage to get the last laugh on their rivals.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dan and Laura face a life-or-death crisis as the buyers assemble in Hemet, Calif.; Brandi tries to keep Jarrod focused on business; Mary finds an out-of-this-world item.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Mary feels out of place in high-society Palm Springs, Calif.; Ivy keeps his eyes open for vintage items; Darrell battles Rene.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: The buyers look for great deals in Costa Mesa, Calif., an area that Dave knows all too well; Mary attempts to spend big; Darrell hopes to shut out a competitor.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Ivy hopes to change his luck in Montebello, Calif.; Jarrod and Brandi fight for big lockers; Dave controls his bidding but can't keep a lid on his temper.
